From Wiktionary, the free dictionary

Bikol Central

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from Spanish determinar.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • Hyphenation: de‧ter‧mi‧nar
  • IPA(key): /deteɾmiˈnaɾ/ [d̪e.teɾ.miˈn̪aɾ]

Verb

[edit]

determinar

  1. to determine
    Synonym: mangno

Derived terms

[edit]
  • determinaron
  • magdeterminar

Related terms

[edit]
  • determinado
  • determinasyon

Catalan

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from Latin dētermināre (“limit, set a bound”).

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): (Central, Balearic) [də.tər.miˈna]
  • IPA(key): (Valencia) [de.teɾ.miˈnaɾ]
  • Audio (Barcelona):(file)
  • Rhymes: -a(ɾ)

Verb

[edit]

determinar (first-person singular present determino, first-person singular preterite determiní, past participle determinat)

  1. to determine

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of determinar (first conjugation)
infinitive determinar
gerund determinant
past participle masculine feminine
singular determinat determinada
plural determinats determinades
person singular plural
first second third first second third
indicative jo tu ell/ella
vostè 		nosaltres
nós 		vosaltres
vós 		ells/elles
vostès
present determino determines determina determinem determineu determinen
imperfect determinava determinaves determinava determinàvem determinàveu determinaven
future determinaré determinaràs determinarà determinarem determinareu determinaran
preterite determiní determinares determinà determinàrem determinàreu determinaren
conditional determinaria determinaries determinaria determinaríem determinaríeu determinarien
subjunctive jo tu ell/ella
vostè 		nosaltres
nós 		vosaltres
vós 		ells/elles
vostès
present determini determinis determini determinem determineu determinin
imperfect determinés determinessis determinés determinéssim determinéssiu determinessin
imperative — tu vostè nosaltres vosaltres
vós 		vostès
affirmative — determina determini determinem determineu determinin
negative (no) — no determinis no determini no determinem no determineu no determinin

Derived terms

[edit]
  • article determinat

Related terms

[edit]
  • determinació

Further reading

[edit]
  • “determinar”, in Diccionari de la llengua catalana [Dictionary of the Catalan Language] (in Catalan), second edition, Institute of Catalan Studies [Catalan: Institut d'Estudis Catalans], April 2007
  • “determinar”, in Gran Diccionari de la Llengua Catalana, Grup Enciclopèdia Catalana, 2025
  • “determinar” in Diccionari normatiu valencià, Acadèmia Valenciana de la Llengua.
  • “determinar” in Diccionari català-valencià-balear, Antoni Maria Alcover and Francesc de Borja Moll, 1962.

Galician

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

From Latin dēterminō (“limit, set a bound”).

Verb

[edit]

determinar (first-person singular present determino, first-person singular preterite determinei, past participle determinado)

  1. to determine

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of determinar
Singular Plural
First-person
(eu) 		Second-person
(ti) 		Third-person
(el / ela / Vde.) 		First-person
(nós) 		Second-person
(vós) 		Third-person
(eles / elas / Vdes.)
Infinitive
Impersonal determinar
Personal determinar determinares determinar determinarmos determinardes determinaren
Gerund
determinando
Past participle
Masculine determinado determinados
Feminine determinada determinadas
Indicative
Present determino determinas determina determinamos determinades determinan
Imperfect determinaba determinabas determinaba determinabamos determinabades determinaban
Preterite determinei determinaches determinou determinamos determinastes determinaron
Pluperfect determinara determinaras determinara determinaramos determinarades determinaran
Future determinarei determinarás determinará determinaremos determinaredes determinarán
Conditional determinaría determinarías determinaría determinariamos determinariades determinarían

Present determine determines determine determinemos determinedes determinen
Imperfect determinase determinases determinase determinásemos determinásedes determinasen

Imperative

(nós) 		Second-person
(vós) 		Third-person
(eles / elas / vocês)

Impersonal determinar
Personal determinar determinares determinar determinarmos determinardes determinarem
Gerund
determinando
Past participle
Masculine determinado determinados
Feminine determinada determinadas
Indicative
Present determino determinas determina determinamos determinades, determinais determinam
Imperfect determinava determinavas determinava determinávamos determinávades, determináveis, determinávais1 determinavam
Preterite determinei determinaste, determinache1 determinou determinamos determinastes determinárom, determinaram
Pluperfect determinara determinaras determinara determináramos determinárades, determináreis, determinárais1 determinaram
Future determinarei determinarás determinará determinaremos determinaredes, determinareis determinarám, determinarão
Conditional determinaria determinarias determinaria determinaríamos determinaríades, determinaríeis, determinaríais1 determinariam
Subjunctive
Present determine determines determine determinemos determinedes, determineis determinem
Imperfect determinasse determinasses determinasse determinássemos determinássedes, determinásseis determinassem
Future determinar determinares determinar determinarmos determinardes determinarem
Imperative
Affirmative determina determine determinemos determinade, determinai determinem
Negative (nom) nom determines nom determine nom determinemos nom determinedes, nom determineis nom determinem

1Less recommended.

Related terms

[edit]
  • determinación

Further reading

[edit]
  • “determinar”, in Dicionario da Real Academia Galega (in Galician), A Coruña: Royal Galician Academy, 2012–2025
  • “determinar”, in Dicionário Estraviz de galego (in Galician), 2014–2025

Occitan

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

From Latin dēterminō.

Verb

[edit]

determinar

  1. to determine

Portuguese

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

Borrowed from Latin dētermināre (“limit, set a bound”).

Pronunciation

[edit]
 
  • (Brazil) IPA(key): /de.teʁ.miˈna(ʁ)/ [de.teɦ.miˈna(h)]
  • (Brazil) IPA(key): /de.teʁ.miˈna(ʁ)/ [de.teɦ.miˈna(h)]
    • (São Paulo) IPA(key): /de.teɾ.miˈna(ɾ)/
    • (Rio de Janeiro) IPA(key): /de.teʁ.miˈna(ʁ)/ [de.teʁ.miˈna(χ)]
    • (Southern Brazil) IPA(key): /de.teɻ.miˈna(ɻ)/
 
  • (Portugal) IPA(key): /dɨ.tɨɾ.miˈnaɾ/
  • (Portugal) IPA(key): /dɨ.tɨɾ.miˈnaɾ/
    • (Southern Portugal) IPA(key): /dɨ.tɨɾ.miˈna.ɾi/

  • Hyphenation: de‧ter‧mi‧nar

Verb

[edit]

determinar (first-person singular present determino, first-person singular preterite determinei, past participle determinado)

  1. to determine

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of determinar (See Appendix:Portuguese verbs)
Singular Plural
First-person
(eu) 		Second-person
(tu) 		Third-person
(ele / ela / você) 		First-person
(nós) 		Second-person
(vós) 		Third-person
(eles / elas / vocês)
Infinitive
Impersonal determinar
Personal determinar determinares determinar determinarmos determinardes determinarem
Gerund
determinando
Past participle
Masculine determinado determinados
Feminine determinada determinadas
Indicative
Present determino determinas determina determinamos determinais determinam
Imperfect determinava determinavas determinava determinávamos determináveis determinavam
Preterite determinei determinaste determinou determinamos1, determinámos2 determinastes determinaram
Pluperfect determinara determinaras determinara determináramos determináreis determinaram
Future determinarei determinarás determinará determinaremos determinareis determinarão
Conditional determinaria determinarias determinaria determinaríamos determinaríeis determinariam
Subjunctive
Present determine determines determine determinemos determineis determinem
Imperfect determinasse determinasses determinasse determinássemos determinásseis determinassem
Future determinar determinares determinar determinarmos determinardes determinarem
Imperative
Affirmative determina determine determinemos determinai determinem
Negative (não) não determines não determine não determinemos não determineis não determinem

1Brazilian Portuguese.
2European Portuguese.

Related terms

[edit]
  • determinação

Spanish

[edit]

Etymology

[edit]

From Latin dētermināre (“limit, set a bound”). Cognate with English determine.

Pronunciation

[edit]
  • IPA(key): /deteɾmiˈnaɾ/ [d̪e.t̪eɾ.miˈnaɾ]
  • Rhymes: -aɾ
  • Syllabification: de‧ter‧mi‧nar

Verb

[edit]

determinar (first-person singular present determino, first-person singular preterite determiné, past participle determinado)

  1. to determine

Conjugation

[edit]
    Conjugation of determinar (See Appendix:Spanish verbs)
infinitive determinar
gerund determinando
past participle masculine feminine
singular determinado determinada
plural determinados determinadas
singular plural
1st person 2nd person 3rd person 1st person 2nd person 3rd person
indicative yo tú
vos 		él/ella/ello
usted 		nosotros
nosotras 		vosotros
vosotras 		ellos/ellas
ustedes
present determino determinastú
determinásvos 		determina determinamos determináis determinan
imperfect determinaba determinabas determinaba determinábamos determinabais determinaban
preterite determiné determinaste determinó determinamos determinasteis determinaron
future determinaré determinarás determinará determinaremos determinaréis determinarán
conditional determinaría determinarías determinaría determinaríamos determinaríais determinarían
subjunctive yo tú
vos 		él/ella/ello
usted 		nosotros
nosotras 		vosotros
vosotras 		ellos/ellas
ustedes
present determine determinestú
determinésvos2 		determine determinemos determinéis determinen
imperfect
(ra) 		determinara determinaras determinara determináramos determinarais determinaran
imperfect
(se) 		determinase determinases determinase determinásemos determinaseis determinasen
future1 determinare determinares determinare determináremos determinareis determinaren
imperative — tú
vos 		usted nosotros
nosotras 		vosotros
vosotras 		ustedes
affirmative determinatú
determinávos 		determine determinemos determinad determinen
negative no determines no determine no determinemos no determinéis no determinen

1Mostly obsolete, now mainly used in legal language.
2Argentine and Uruguayan voseo prefers the tú form for the present subjunctive.

    Selected combined forms of determinar

These forms are generated automatically and may not actually be used. Pronoun usage varies by region.

Derived terms

[edit]
  • predeterminar (“to predetermine”)

Related terms

[edit]
  • determinación

[edit]
